mainContent:
Content

- 1 Prettier
- 2 Husky
- 3 Lint Staged

1 - Config Prettier Format code

Step 1 - Cài đặt Extension Prettier Format Code trong Vscode
Step 2 - Tạo file config :
1.2.1 Create File .vscode/settings.json at Root : 

{
    "editor.formatOnSave": true,
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode"
}

1.2.2 Create File .prettierrc at Root : 

{
    "arrowParens": "always",
    "bracketSameLine": false,
    "bracketSpacing": true,
    "embeddedLanguageFormatting": "auto",
    "htmlWhitespaceSensitivity": "css",
    "insertPragma": false,
    "jsxSingleQuote": false,
    "printWidth": 120,
    "proseWrap": "preserve",
    "quoteProps": "as-needed",
    "requirePragma": false,
    "semi": true,
    "singleQuote": true,
    "tabWidth": 4,
    "trailingComma": "all",
    "useTabs": false,
    "vueIndentScriptAndStyle": false
}

2 - Husky

Step 1 - Install Husky in dev dependencies 
npm install husky --save-dev
Step 2 - Config on Package.json

- Công dụng của Husky giúp cho Developer có thể thực hiện một số script trước khi commit
- Trên hình Husky sẽ giúp chạy lệnh lint-staged

3 - Lint Staged

Step 1 - Install Lint-Staged in dev dependencies
Step 2 - Config on Package.json

- Công dụng của lint-staged là giúp Developer có thể thực hiện một số script lên các file trong staging
- Trên hình Husky sẽ giúp chạy lệnh Lint-staged
- Lint-staged sẽ thực hiện lệnh "eslint", "prettier --write" lên các file ".js", ".jsx" ở trong staging
